programme.title: John Tower and Colonel North
programme.short_synopsis: Do the personal problems of John Tower mean he is unable to advise President Bush?
programme.medium_synopsis: The Senate Committee's ruling that former Senator John Tower should not be allowed to join President Bush's cabinet, and the trial of Colonel Oliver North.
